document.full_text: teamsters local 705 began a campaign in the chicago area demanding that u.p.s. reduce workloads and change what the union calls a 'blame the worker' approach to health and safety.
document.title: chicago news cooperative: u.p.s. workers demand new approach to safety
lines_and_colors: teamsters local 705 began a campaign in the chicago area demanding that u.p.s. reduce workloads and change what the union calls a 'blame the worker' approach to health and safety.
